TopicTitle: Project Arctic- Modders and Texturers needed

Articles.Content:
Project Arctic

What is Project Arctic?

Project Arctic is an ambitious project to create a film using KSP, the Project will stretch from late 2014 onwards, and hopefully the end outcome will be a high quality interesting film for the KSP community to make.

Who am I?

I am a humble car and vehicle creator in KSP, I run two companies; Vagani Car Manufacturers and Vagani-Gara. IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve never undertook a project this large and inspiring before and I look forward to the learning curve and working with you guys/girls. J

What are we hoping to achieve?

Well IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d love this to be an example for squad to show what this game can do. IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d also like to reach out and tell the gaming community what a great game KSP is.

Why am I here?

Well I am in dire need of some people who can mod and/or texture for our film, we currently have 28 people doing various jobs for the film, and yet we donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t one that specialises in modding or textures.

How Can You Become Part Of The Team

Well simply fill in this form and weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll add you to the team.

What do you specialise in?

I would love to help out with the texturing, but I've reached a point in my life where I will only have occasional internet access at best in about a week. Sorry, but this is it for me. I hope you guys make something great!
